item.title: CVE-2024-30177|2024-03-27T10:21:52.380Z -- exclusive%20addons -- exclusive%20addons%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Exclusive Addons Exclusive Addons Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Exclusive Addons Elementor: from n/a through 2.6.8.
